snippet.title: Borderlands 4 FIRST PATCH & Weekly Reset – HUGE Fixes, Free Loot, & A Controversial Nerf
snippet.description:
Patch day is here, Vault Hunters! Borderlands 4 just dropped its first major update alongside the weekly reset, and we’re breaking it all down. From massive PC performance fixes to a controversial nerf, plus new SHIFT codes, Maurice’s Black Market location, Wildcard Mission rewards, and the Moxxi Big Encore boss loot table—you don’t want to miss this. Discover how to farm the guaranteed Hellwalker shotgun, scoop up free legendaries, and maximize your weekly grind.

0:00 Intro
0:14 Updates & Fixes
1:53 Maurice's Black Market
2:27 Wildcard Mission - Hellwalker Shotgun
3:39 Moxxi's Big Encore - Shadowpelt & Legendaries
5:26 SHiFT Codes
6:04 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
